item.title: A question about a code
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

Why not do something like

public void checkAbyss(int ID) {
switch (ID) {
case tendrils:
whatever
break;
}
}

Then on click objects put
checkAbyss(objectID);

item.title: A question about a code
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok so im making the abyss work, and i wanted to know if this was good for the switch statements:

[code]public void AbyssOuterInner() //Go From Outer To Inner © Zyle269952
{
int Woodcutting = 8;
int Tendril;
int Agility = 16;
int Gap;
int Firemaking = 11;
int Boil;
int Thieving = 17;
int Eyes;
int Mining = 14;
int Rocks;
int Passage = 7148;

					switch(EntryID)
						{
							case 0: // Chopping Tendrils
							if(Tendril == 7152)
								{
									TeleToX = 3051;
									TeleToY = 4824;
								}
							if(Tendril == 7144)
								{
									TeleToX = 3028;
									TeleToY = 4821;
								}
							break;
							
							case 1: //Burning Boils
							if(Boil == 7151)
								{
									TeleToX = 3053;
									TeleToY = 4831;
								}
							if(Boil == 7145)
								{
									TeleToX = 3025;
									TeleToY = 4834;
								}
							break;
							
							case 2: //Mining Rock
							if(Rock == 7153)
								{
									TeleToX = 3047;
									TeleToY = 4821;
								}
							if(Rock == 7143)
								{
									TeleToX = 3028;
									TeleToY = 4825;
								}
							break;
							
							case 3: //Distract Eyes
							if(Eyes == 7150)
								{
									TeleToX = 3051;
									TeleToY = 4839;
								}
							if(Eyes == 7146)
								{
									TeleToX = 3029;
									TeleToY = 4841;
								}
							break;
							
							case 4: // Squeeze Through Gap
							if(Gap == 7149)
								{
									TeleToX = 3049;
									TeleToY = 4842;
								}
							if(Gap == 7147)
								{
									TeleToX = 3029;
									TeleToY = 4842;
								}
							break;
							
							case 5: //Go Through Passage
							if(Passage)
								{
									TeleToX = 3038;
									TeleToY = 4845;
								}
							break;
							
							default:
							SendMessage("You Failed To Get Through The Outer Ring Of The Abyss");
							break;
						}
				}

[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 05:16:49 PM[/size][hr]anyone know?
